preqs: If students are enrolled in course 0503 there are no prerequisites. If students are enrolled in course 0748, 0790, 0826, 3843 or 4402 prerequisite is ACF5955.

rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {ACC5100, ACC7100, ACF5100, AFF5100%}
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 07, 11, 12, 20, 21, 42, 50PG, 56, 65}
For (COURSE_CODE NOT IN {0503, B6002} AND COURSE_CODE IN {0748, 0790, 0826, 3843, 4402, B6011}) Do Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ACF5955} Otherwise true

Must be enrolled in course version {0503, 0748, 0790, 0826, 3843, 3850, 4401, 4402}
For (COURSE_CODE NOT IN {0503, B6002} AND COURSE_CODE IN {0748, 0790, 0826, 3843, 4402, B6011}) Do Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ACF5955} Otherwise true
Unit was previously coded {ACC5100, ACC7100, ACF5100, AFF5100%}
Unit was previously coded {ACC5100, ACC7100, ACF5100, AFF5100%}
For COURSE_CODE IN {0748, 0790, 0826, 3843, 4402} Do Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ACF5955, AFX5950} Otherwise true

description: In today's business environment the accountant engages with the organisation's senior managers and contributes to strategy formulation and implementation. This unit focuses on the concepts and techniques of business strategy formulation and how management accounting information systems act as a corporate control system providing information for strategic decisions.
